cc.acquized.itembuilder.api

Class ItemBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • cc.acquized.itembuilder.api.ItemBuilder

  • public class ItemBuilder
extends Object
    Main API for creating ItemStacks easy with just 1 line of code
    Version:
    1.7.1
    Author:
    Acquized (Main Methods & NBT), Kev575 (More Constructors & a few Methods)
    See Also:
    ItemStack

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ItemBuilder.Unsafe
      This Methods are unsafe and should not be used when you don't know what they do.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ItemBuilder(ItemBuilder builder)
      Initials the Main with an already existing instance of the Main
      ItemBuilder(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
      Initials the Main with an already existing ItemStack
      ItemBuilder(org.bukkit.Material material)
      Initials the Main with the Material
      ItemBuilder(org.bukkit.Material material, int amount)
      Initials the Main with the Material and the amount
      ItemBuilder(org.bukkit.Material material, int amount, String displayname)
      Initials the Main with the Material, the amount and the displaname
      ItemBuilder(org.bukkit.Material material, String displayname)
      Initials the Main with the Material and the displaname

      Adds the ItemFlag to the builded ItemStack

      Sets the ItemFlags of the builded ItemStack
      ItemBuilder glow()
      Makes the Item Glow

      Sets the lore of the builded ItemStack
      ItemBuilder lore(String line)
      Adds the line to the Lore of the builded ItemStack
      ItemBuilder lore(String line, int count)
      Adds the line as the counts position as lore
      ItemBuilder lores(String... lines)
      Adds the lines to the Lore of the builded ItemStack

      Sets the Material of the builded ItemStack
      ItemBuilder meta(org.bukkit.inventory.meta.ItemMeta meta)
      Sets the ItemMeta of the builded ItemStack
      ItemBuilder owner(String user)
      Sets the Owner of the Skull This only affects if the Item is a SKULL_ITEM or a SKULL
      ItemBuilder replaceAndSymbol()
      Toggles the replace of the ampersand (&) symbol to the section sign (ยง) symbol
      ItemBuilder replaceAndSymbol(boolean replace)
      Enables / disables the replace of the ampersand (&) symbol to the section sign (ยง) symbol
      ItemBuilder unbreakable(boolean unbreakable)
      Makes the Item (un-)breakable
      ItemBuilder.Unsafe unsafe()
      Method to access all NBT Methods
